info.title: BasketManager Pro API
info.description: Enterprise Basketball Club Management API with multi-tenant architecture, real-time scoring, and comprehensive statistics.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of team with filtering and sorting options.

head.description: Retrieve a paginated list of team with filtering and sorting options.

post.description: Create a new team with validation and automatic relationship setup.

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific team including related data.

head.description: Get detailed information about a specific team including related data.

put.description: Update an existing team with partial or complete data replacement.

patch.description: Update an existing team with partial or complete data replacement.

delete.description: Permanently delete a team and handle cascading relationships.
